summary: I KNOW I’m overanalyzing but in today’s liveshow, phil making sure that dan was in the view and he kept adjusting the computer...
body: I KNOW I’m overanalyzing but in today’s liveshow, phil making sure that dan was in the view and he kept adjusting the computer every time he wasn’t, was just so….good? like phil always makes sure that dan is there and that he is involved and it just reminds me of back in 2011 when phil was offered to do the radio show but he wouldn’t do it without dan? it really be like that huh

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

title: 1Before We Land
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Lacv9g

by danfanciesphil (thejigsawtimess)

Twelve hours on a non-stop flight to Tokyo would be no problem for Dan normally. Working for a prestigious law firm has secured him a seat in First Class, and he’s on his second glass of champagne as soon as they’re in the air. If only he can stop making a fool of himself in front of the cute, endearingly clumsy flight attendant, he might just get through it without hurling himself out of the emergency exit.

Words: 7306, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Flight Attendants, aeroplane, Airplanes, First Class, Lawyers, Waiting, Clumsiness, Awkwardness, Getting Together, Happy Ending, Humor, FlightAttendant!Phil, Lawyer!Dan

blog.name: freckliedan
blog.title: be happy
blog.description:
denney / denjamin ❀ 23 ❀ usa
they / them lesbian

the stars are gay for dan and phil
buy me a coffee?

summary: have you guys ever heard that story about how if you throw a frog into a pot of boiling water, it’ll jump out–but if you put it...
body:
have you guys ever heard that story about how if you throw a frog into a pot of boiling water, it’ll jump out–but if you put it in a pot of water at room temperature and slowly turn the heat up, it’ll just sit there as it boils without even noticing?

i’ve been of the opinion for a long time that dan and phil use gamingmas in a really similar way; when they give us that much content all at once back to back, they’re able to turn up the gay without us noticing it a big change so that we just accept that this is the new normal. 

ever since they announced that gamingmas wouldn’t be happening this year, i’ve been wondering what they’d replace it with. they still need to have something that fulfills its function in terms of their management of their public image and their relationship with the fandom, so i was sure it would be something.

so finding out that we’re about to get 5 days of dilmas when dan and phil have said that dab and evan need to move in together and start their lives? right after we’ve had a bunch of content from them where they both have referenced their early years living together? 

well. i’m not wondering how they’re going to boil the frog anymore.

summary: People who are upset with Dilmas, be grateful. They just did a world tour and they don’t owe us anything at all. They could’ve...
body: People who are upset with Dilmas, be grateful. They just did a world tour and they don’t owe us anything at all. They could’ve taken December off if they wanted to. They could’ve done nothing special for December. It’s the holiday season and we’re gonna be getting domestic sims videos, Dab and Evan growing up and moving out, dil accomplishing Master Mixology, Dalien growing up and potentially getting a bf or gf, just lots of domestic and festive bants

reblog.comment: People who are upset with Dilmas, be grateful. They just did a world tour and they don’t owe us anything at all. They could’ve taken December off if they wanted to. They could’ve done nothing special for December. It’s the holiday season and we’re gonna be getting domestic sims videos, Dab and Evan growing up and moving out, dil accomplishing Master Mixology, Dalien growing up and potentially getting a bf or gf, just lots of domestic and festive bants

They could’ve done nothing special for December. It’s the holiday season and we’re gonna be getting domestic sims videos, Dab and Evan growing up and moving out, dil accomplishing Master Mixology, Dalien growing up and potentially getting a bf or gf, just lots of domestic and festive bants
